About me

I'm a detail-oriented person with good communication skills. As a semi-professional football player, l have become a great team player and learned the importance of discipline, dedication, and hard work. A very curious person, always looking to learn about new things. At this moment, my priority is to expand my knowledge about JavaScript and write clean code...

Development

Experience

Web development intership

Vega IT Novi Sad,Serbia | May 2022

Worked with a mentor for 3 weeks. Learned to use gulp and create multiple tasks. Raising awareness about HTML semantics, performance, and accessibility of the website. Implementing plugins was part of the internship also. Looking at the bigger picture while developing (example: caring about people with disabilities who are visiting website)

Education

Advanced Frontend Develoment

FTN Informatika Novi Sad, Serbia | November 2021 - May 2022

Final test result on course was 86%. Learned about:

  • Web-based system architecture and HTTP protocols
  • Basic HTML concepts and advanced HTML 5 components
  • Basic and advanced CSS constructions including Bootstrap, and SCSS script language.
  • General principles of web design and developing user-friendly pages
  • JavaScript fundamental elements include objects, functions, DOM, and Event listeners.
  • Typescript as an upgrade from JavaScript
  • Knowledge of object-oriented programming
  • Angular framework, a good understanding of modules, creating components, services, and routing to the working with external libraries

Bachelor in engineering management

Faculty of Technical Science Novi Sad, Serbia | October 2021

The studies included acquiring a combination of engineering and managerial knowledge. We mostly worked on adopting and improving knowledge in the field of planning, organizing, managing, and improving business processes, through the application of e-business and information and communication technologies.In the last year of my studies, I chose the Information Management module, where the focus was on acquiring knowledge about OOP, Backend, Frontend development and databases.
